description: Source: [KEGG Pathways](http://www.genome.jp/kegg-bin/show_pathway?mtu00053). The Ascorbate and aldarate metabolism for Mycobacterium tuberculosis is not completely understood yet; conversions which are not clear are depicted with a dashed arrow. Two out of the three literature references provided for this pathway are for E. coli and could be not specific enough for Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
title: Ascorbate and aldarate metabolism
